Issa Samb, onye a makwaara dị ka Joe Ouakam (31 Disemba 1945 - 25 Eprel 2017) bụ onye Senegal na-ese ihe, onye na-akpụ ihe ọkpụkpụ, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na -ede egwuregwu na onye na-ede uri.
A mụrụ Issa Samb na 31 Disemba 1945 na Dakar, Senegal. Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Dakar, ebe ọ gụrụ nkà ihe ọmụma na iwu.

Samb were aha Joe Ouakam. O mere ọrụ nke gụnyere ihe ọkpụkpụ, arụmọrụ, eserese na ihe nkiri. A na-ewere ọrụ ya dị ka nke sitere na ọdịnala Afrịka na European avant-garde movements dị ka Dada, Surrealism, Situationism na Fluxus.
A maara Samb nke ọma maka ọnụnọ ya
Mmekọrịta ya na obodo ahụ mere ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà a ma ama na Dakar
Ụlọ ọrụ Samb dị n'etiti obodo, nke a na-ahụkarị na ihe dị iche iche na ọrụ dị iche iche, bụ nke jere ozi dị ka ihe ngosi nke ya
Ọ baghị uru ikwu na Samb rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na nka Dakar.

Samb bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Laboratoire Agit'Art n'afọ 1973. E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Whitechapel Gallery, London na ngosi ya nke akụkọ asaa nke nka oge a n'Africa na 1995 na 2008 Biennale de l'Art Africain Contemporain, Dak'Art na Dakar. N'afọ 2010, e mere ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya na National Art Gallery, Dakar. E gosipụtakwara ọrụ ya na 2012 documenta na Kassel, Germany. Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2014, InIVA, ụlọ ngosi nka na London, haziri 'Issa Samb: Site n'ụkpụrụ omume nke ime ihe na Alaeze Ukwu na-enweghị akara'.
N'afọ 2019, onye nlekọta Koyo Kouoh họọrọ Samb's La Cour (The Yard) (2013), ebe obibi na ọrụ na-agbanwe agbanwe na ntinye ogige, dị ka nhọrọ ya maka ọrụ kachasị emetụta n'ime afọ iri.
Samb nwụrụ na 25 Eprel 2017, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa na isii.
